snippet: Oscar Pistorius will be released from prison for good behavior on Aug. 21 and be placed under house arrest after serving 10 months for killing his girlfriend.
abstract: Oscar Pistorius is set to be released from prison for good behavior and be placed under house arrest, after serving 10 months of five-year prison sentence; Pistorius was found guilty of manslaughter in death of girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp.
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius will be released from prison for good behavior on Aug. 21 and be placed under house arrest after serving 10 months for killing his girlfriend.

headline.main: South Africa: After 10 Months in Prison, Pistorius to Be Released to House Arrest
headline.print_headline: Africa; South Africa: After 10 Months in Prison, Pistorius Will Be Moved to House Arrest
